issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: branch-2 compilation is broken in hadoop-azure

comments.body: yeah, I'd just heard about that internally. Happens on java7 only.
Attaching branch-2 patch. I tried to use StringUtils.join from haddop common util package.

-1
patch is for a different bug. Cancelling patch & awaiting the correct attachment

Thats my bad :( Extremely sorry.

Accidentally shared a wrong patch. Attaching correct one.
thanks. While we await yetus's review: which azure endpoint have you run the azure test suite against?

Thank you.

I ran against WASB/Japan. Here is my local test results.

This message was automatically generated.

+1

* jenkins build overreacting as branch-2 itself is broken
* the build with patch was with java 7 & it worked.
* compiled with java 8  locally and tested the {{TestWasbRemoteCallHelper}} patch this went near

Committed. 

Note I was being lax in accepting that running a single test suited was enough to verify regressions: its only an error message and yetus was checking the build itself. In future, expect to  have to run the full suite before patch review.

Thank you very much [~stevel@apache.org] for review and commit.
Yes, I will ensure a full test suite run in such scenarios from next time. Thank you for pointing out.
